name: part_012
file: tmp_【新3Dお披露目】周防パトラ生誕祭！ゲスト FUWAMOCO＆豪華ビデオレター！重大告知あり！Birthday Party 2025【周防パトラ】 [bubs05N-m04]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_012.mov

scenes.description: Ending section of the birthday live stream featuring a handwritten message from Suou Patra over an instrumental background track.

subtitles.original: 生誕祭ライブ終わりました！
subtitles.english: The birthday celebration live has ended!

subtitles.original: つたない歌と豪華なステージで
subtitles.english: With my clumsy singing and a gorgeous stage,

subtitles.original: はしゃぐパトが今年もできたのは
subtitles.english: the fact that Patra could frolic again this year

subtitles.original: 今日もこの世界に生きててくれてありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you for being alive in this world today!

subtitles.original: パトは今皆といることが一番楽しいです。♡
subtitles.english: Patra is having the most fun being with everyone right now. ♡

subtitles.original: それはきっと世界で一番幸せなことです。
subtitles.english: That is surely the happiest thing in the world.

subtitles.original:
周防パトラ 誕生3Dライブ 2025
3D新髪型お披露目 GUEST FUWAMOCO
subtitles.english:
Suou Patra Birthday 3D Live 2025
3D New Hairstyle Reveal - GUEST: FUWAMOCO
